name: Captain Hann Gover
description:
This game is a side-scroller platformer 2D with a noice hook mechanic and a peculiar backstory. It was made for a GameJam as a collaboration of a group of five people: Jonatas Lopes, João Vitor, Gustavo Salmeron, João Faleiro and Julia de Melo.

Instructions: You can control Captain Hann Gover with the arrow keys or W, A, S, D. Activate the hook with the right mouse button and use the left mouse button to let it go.

Check it out and feel free to leave your feedback, comment about it.

Help us capppp
